comments.body: Great explanation of React Hooks fundamentals
Would love to see more examples with useContext

The section on list comprehension was particularly helpful
How about adding some mutation examples?
The responsive layout examples were very practical
Exactly what I needed for my Node.js project
Would love a follow-up on advanced types

Would be nice to see performance benchmarks
